Description: Clay tablet; nearly complete; tabulated account of disbursements, deliveries and their difference, of sesame, for different persons; Old Babylonian.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.228)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
